main event: An amber light resembling an airplane with landing lights was observed over Roanoke, Virginia on May 12, 1949.
interesting points: The observer described the object as having a red glow at the tip and trailing sparks., The object moved slowly and emitted sounds similar to B-29 motors., Multiple reports were received from different witnesses describing similar sightings., Initial assumptions by police in surrounding areas suggested the object could have been jets flying at high altitude., The object was seen for several minutes before disappearing from view.
witness description: two local residents, one of whom has a history of working at the post office
